alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 5:01PM PST until January 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches...except 4 to 7 inches Mosier west. * WHERE...Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington and of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dropping temperatures overnight can also lead to wet surfaces freezing prompting slippery and icy conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon
